      • Receptionist

        public Receptionist(java.lang.String id,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String phone)
        This constructor, respectively takes these parameters: the id,name and phone of the guest. Then initialize them to the member variable.

        This constructor -is in the process of book,check in or check out - to verify the identity of the guest was created.

        Parameters:
        id - The identification number of the guest.
        name - the name of the guest.
        phone - the phone number of the guest.

        guestName - The name of the guest.

        phone - The phone of the guest.
        in - The check in date of the guest.
        out - The check out date of the guest.

      • check_in

        public boolean check_in(int room_no)
        This function makes check-in to the hotel. Firstly, it inquires whether there is a record according to the input received from the user. This record`s variable of the room statu must be equal to "book".İf conditions are met ,check in will be happen.
        Returns:
        Returns boolean.If check in will be successfully returns true else return false.

      • check_in

        public void check_in(java.lang.String type)
        This function makes check-in to the hotel,if the first check_in() function returns false. The function takes the type of the room as a parameter. Then sends this parameter as a parameter to function searchRoom. The search function returns the number of rows in the csv file of this room if there is a room in the hotel which type is equals to this parameter type. Then this method creates a new room object- which holds room availability as not available- and sends it to the changeList method to print the new record in to the csv file.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the room.

      • check_out

        public void check_out(int room_no)
        This function makes check-out to the hotel. Firstly, it inquires whether there is a record according to the input received from the user. This records`s variable of the room statu must be equal to "check in".İf conditions are met , check in will be happen.

        The number of days between the input and output dates will be found by the auxiliary functions. Then the day is multiplied by the cost of the room and bill will be printed on the screen.

        Return type is a string.
